alert.note: Alert for Cass; Fulton; Miami; White (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 8:42AM EDT until July 23 at 9:15AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 AM EDT FOR WHITE...SOUTHERN FULTON...CASS AND NORTHWESTERN MIAMI COUNTIES... At 841 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Akron to near Logansport to Monticello, moving southeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Logansport, Rochester, Monticello, Brookston, Akron, Wolcott, Royal Center, Reynolds, Chalmers, Burnettsville, Fulton, Macy, Clymers, Smithson, Nyena Lake, Leases Corner, Deedsville, Indiana Beach, Hoover and Idaville. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 185 and 198. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
